data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: The list is sorted by nicknames but the members are displayed as usernames and not nicknames
data.expected_result: The list is sorted by usernames
data.short_description: Member list in a channel's permission override menu is sorted by nickname, but names are displayed as usernames
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a channel you can manage permissions on - Edit that channel - Go to User Management -> Permissions - Click on Add a Member - Observe the list
